CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 13, 1952, page 26, reads: "Seagram's Trophy - One of the outstanding trophies awarded at the recent UGA National Tournament held at Pittsburgh's South Park Golf Course was the tremendous leg trophy awarded by the Seagram's Vanguard Association to the winner of the professional championship. Ted Rhodes, the winner, left, is shown being congratulated by Joe Christian, national sales representative for Seagram's. Looking on are A. D. V. Crosby of Columbus, Ohio, president of the UGA, and Robert French. Western Pennsylvania representative for Seagram's. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four men, Ted Rhodes and Joe Christian shaking hands, with A.D.V. Crosby and Robert "Bob" P. French Jr. standing behind them, gathered around UGA National Tournament golf trophy at South Park Golf Course
